p: Of the 376 participants enrolled in the survey, 212 (56%) were female. The mean age was 38. The majority (51%) were unemployed, 14% reported to be professionally employed, and 35% were self-employed. All participants were currently taking ART with only 4% having been on ART for less than a year, while 27% had between 1 and 5 years duration on ART, and 69% had been on ART for more than 5 years. Additional information is in Table 1.
